text:
I get this compiler error when trying to compile the source.   

[javac] D:\database\xml-xindice-1.0\java\src\org\apache\xindice\core\query\X
athQueryResolver.java:502: array required, but org.apache.xpath.compiler.OpMapV
ctor found
   [javac]          int endFunc = pos + (cmp.getOpMap())[pos+1] - 1;
   [javac]                                              ^
   [javac] D:\database\xml-xindice-1.0\java\src\org\apache\xindice\core\query\X
athQueryResolver.java:502: operator - cannot be applied to java.lang.String,int

   [javac]          int endFunc = pos + (cmp.getOpMap())[pos+1] - 1;
   [javac]                                                      ^
   [javac] Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
   [javac] Note: Recompile with -deprecation for details.
   [javac] 2 errors
creator: vasagotempest2@yahoo.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 25472 ***

text: As it says in #25472, specify endorsed libs to point to right Xerces/Xalan versions.
